title: Regulating Alternative Medicines: Disorder in the Borderland
author: Michael Trebilcock; Kanksha Ghimire
description: In many Western countries, the use of complementary and alternative medicines (CAMs) has been growing. Individuals in Western countries often use CAMs in conjunction with biomedicine (also referred to
